entry.title: Dream Boxed
entry.summary: The "Dream Boxed" is a new form of art that is psychedelic, poetic, strange, and surreal, immersing people as if in a dream...
entry.content:
The "Dream Boxed" is a new form of art that is psychedelic, poetic, strange, and surreal, immersing people as if in a dream...

Technology reveals the collective ideals and preferences formed by humans in the context of time, and the content of dreams symbolizes ideals, subconsciousness, nostalgia... Technology, like a "dream," adds reality between nostalgia and hope, dismantles existing logic, and reassembles it into a narrative vocabulary that is familiar yet unfamiliar; it is also like a "box," stimulating people to explore or question the unknown and mysterious within it.

In this era of virtualization, robots, artificial intelligence (AI), artificial life, and so on, seem to declare the replacement of humans, and everything in the real world is gradually becoming data in a database... We can't help but ponder, is it humans developing technology? Or is technology developing humans? If we look at the current situation, are humans being replaced by what we call intelligent machines? Or can we both take advantage of each other, coexist and mutually benefit? Is it possible that we are also just characters in a "dream," following the collective "ideals" and rules that are "set"? Do we really have self-awareness?

"Dreams are the road to the subconscious." This is Freud's interpretation of dreams. Thoughts by day, dreams by night, perhaps everything is in dreams. The fears, desires, timidity, and anxiety that live in the subconscious more or less affect the content and behavior of dreams. The phrase "In the dream box" may refer to our speculation and questioning of the unknown about people, life, and the environment under the current situation where technology occupies life, whether it is bizarre and beyond realistic imagination, or the remaining images of childhood memories, these doubts and confusion about reality are packed into the surreal dream box.

This exhibition features a total of 11 works. Through technology art, the creators use different media such as power devices, virtual images, AI collaboration, and program operation audio and video to construct one confusing "dream" after another, expressing different interpretations and observations about emotions translated from land, memory, experience, etc.

You are about to open the dream box and explore the subconscious of the creators...

<夢盒裡的>

 

「夢盒」音同於「夢核(dreamcore)」，是一種新興藝術形式，其迷幻、詩意、奇異、超現實的風格，使人如同沉浸於夢境中……

 

科技顯露出人類在時間脈絡下，形成的集體理想與偏好，而夢境的內容象徵著理想、潛意識、懷念……。科技如「夢」一般，在懷念與希冀之間添注現實、拆解現有邏輯，再重組成一套敘事語彙，熟悉也陌生；又如「盒」般，激發人們探索或質疑其中的未知與神秘。

 

在這虛擬化的時代，機器人、人工智慧AI、人工生命等等，儼然發出取代人類的宣言，現實世界的一切逐漸成為資料庫中的數據......我們不禁思考著，是人類發展科技？還是科技發展著人類？若放眼於現況，人類是被我們所稱的智能機器取代呢？還是能夠各取優劣、互利共生呢？我們是否有可能也僅是某場「夢」中的角色，不過是順著被設定出的集體「理想」與規則而「被」趨近？我們究竟是否擁有自我意識？

 

「夢境是通往潛意識的道路。」這是佛洛伊德對夢的詮釋，日有所思，夜有所夢，也許夢裡什麼都有。那些住在潛意識裡的恐懼、渴望、膽怯、焦慮，或多或少影響著夢境的內容與行為。沒有受詞的「夢盒裡的」，或許指涉著科技佔領生活的現況下，我們對人、對生命、對環境等未知的猜測與質疑，不管是怪誕又超乎現實的想像，抑或兒時記憶的殘存畫面，這些對現實的疑惑與迷茫都被裝進了超現實的夢盒裡。

 

此展覽一共展出11件作品，創作者藉由科技藝術，以動力裝置、虛擬影像、AI協作、程式運算音像等不同媒材，建構出一場又一場撲朔迷離的「夢」，表達關於土地、記憶、經歷等情感轉譯而成的不同見解與觀察。

 

你即將打開夢盒，依循著創作者的潛意識一探究竟……

entry.title: Gentle Rain Under the Stars
entry.summary: I walk on the street, gazing at the sky. Their light has traveled thousands or even millions of light-years to reach our eyes.
entry.content:
I walk on the street, gazing at the sky. Their light has traveled thousands or even millions of light-years to reach our eyes. Perhaps the stars have long disappeared, and we will never know. The poetic light shines on us, illuminating us from years ago.

《微雨星空》 Gentle Rain Under the Stars

我走在街上，仰望天際。他們的光芒是經過幾千幾萬光年下的距離，抵達了我們的視線，或許星球早已不在，我們永遠不會知道，詩意猶存的亮光，在好幾年前照耀著我們。

entry.summary: 《f l o w》 Microelectronics Interactive Creation Arduino, Pressure Sensor, Hose, Fluorescent Agent, Water Pump Disordered, melancholy squeezing vibrant youth, I shine in…
entry.content:
《f l o w》

Microelectronics Interactive Creation

Arduino, Pressure Sensor, Hose, Fluorescent Agent, Water Pump

Disordered, melancholy squeezing vibrant youth, I shine in confusion.

 

《f l o w》

微電子互動創作

arduino、壓力感測器、軟管、螢光劑、水泵

失序了，憂鬱擠壓著燦爛的青春，我在迷茫中閃耀。翻譯英文

entry.title: Chaos
entry.summary: The lingering sound of the bell brings tranquility amidst the chaos. Here, we contemplate the complex relationship between the positives and negatives of…
entry.content:
The lingering sound of the bell brings tranquility amidst the chaos. Here, we contemplate the complex relationship between the positives and negatives of faith. Despite being hurt by the superstitions of those around us, we still seek faith in times of confusion for solace.

The inner mixed emotions are embodied in a concrete way in the work.

 

Servo Motor / Bowl / Photopolymerization Printing

伺服馬達 / 缽/  光固化列印
-
 《掙扎》
-
鐘聲餘音繞樑，在混沌中帶來了寧靜。於此我們思考著信仰的正面與負面之間的複雜關係，儘管因身旁人們的迷信而曾感到受傷，我們仍在迷失時尋求信仰以得到心靈撫慰。

內在的混合情感以具象的方式在作品中體現。

黃麗穎 (Huang Liying) - Liying Huang 吳梓軒 (Wu Zixuan) - Zixuan Wu 吳勻楨 (Wu Yunzhen)

entry.title: Bound by Obsession
entry.summary: "Bound by Obsession" : Acrylic, Motors, Bearings, Control Components We explore the concept that superstition and obsession ultimately lead to decay. People often…
entry.content:
"Bound by Obsession" :

Acrylic, Motors, Bearings, Control Components

We explore the concept that superstition and obsession ultimately lead to decay. People often adhere to extreme ideologies in the name of religious beliefs, losing their rationality and objectivity, and ultimately plunging into the abyss of superstition. When individuals develop a strong attachment to a particular religious belief, they may abandon their capacity for critical thinking and judgment, blindly following religious leaders or doctrines. This blind obedience makes them susceptible to manipulation and exploitation, and they may even find themselves in irreversible situations. In such cases of fanaticism, people often confine themselves to narrow worldviews, rejecting alternative perspectives and thoughts. They not only turn a deaf ear to criticism and questioning from the outside world but also potentially conflict with those around them. Such circumstances are highly detrimental to personal growth and social progress. Furthermore, when superstition and obsession give rise to extreme behaviors, they can cause harm to both oneself and others. This harm can manifest physically, such as in self-inflicted harm or intense religious rituals that result in injuries or even fatalities. Additionally, some extremist religious organizations may resort to violence against non-believers or other religious groups, leading to social turmoil and conflict. Apart from physical harm, superstition and obsession can also have negative effects on individuals' mental well-being. When individuals perceive their superstitious beliefs as the only truth, they may experience anxiety, fear, and prejudice, harboring hostility towards themselves and others. They may hold a hostile attitude towards people of different beliefs or perspectives and attempt to persuade or exclude them. Moreover, superstition and obsession can contribute to societal divisions and disharmony. When individuals impose their beliefs on others, it can trigger social conflicts and opposition. In such situations, peaceful coexistence, mutual respect, and acceptance become challenging, thereby affecting the harmonious development of society. In conclusion, superstition and obsession have numerous negative consequences for individuals and society. The loss of rationality and objectivity, combined with blind adherence and obsession with specific beliefs, easily lead to the harmful effects discussed above.

 

作品名稱： 自由意「噬」

媒材： 壓克力、馬達、軸承、控制元件

迷信與執著 終究會導致腐朽。 人們為了宗教信仰而奉行一種極端的思想，失去了理性和客觀的判斷力，最終陷入迷信的深淵 當一個人對於某種宗教信仰產生強烈的執著，他們可能會放棄自己的思考能力和批判思維，而全盲地追隨宗教領袖或教義。 這種盲從行為使得他們容易受到操縱和利用，甚至可能陷入不可挽回的境地。

 

在這種走火入魔的情況下，人們常常將自己封閉於狹窄的世界觀中，拒絕接受其他觀點和思想。他們不僅對外界的批評和質疑充耳不聞，還可能因此與周圍的人產生矛盾和衝突。這樣的情況對於個人的成長和社會的進步都是極其不利的。 

 

黃麗穎 (Huang Liying) - Liying Huang 吳梓軒 (Wu Zixuan) - Zixuan Wu 吳勻楨 (Wu Yunzhen)
